channel.title: Hugo Authors on
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo Authors on

item.title: The Silent AI Overlord is Already Here
item.description: Every few months or years it seems like there’s at least a few news cycles devoted to how Artificial Intelligence is an existential threat to humanity. Sometimes it’s a general warning from Stephen Hawking, or Elon Musk founding a new company. Pop culture also makes sapient AIs into the villian in things like I, Robot; Terminator; Age of Ultron; or even in media aimed more at family and young children like WALL-E.
